description.english: Misjudge a moment to calm someone's nerves.
description.german: Schätze die Chance, jemandes Nerven zu beruhigen, falsch ein.
description.french: Faites une erreur de jugement en tentant de calmer quelqu'un.
description.italian: Sbaglia momento per calmare i nervi di qualcuno.
description.spanish: Juzga mal un momento para calmar a alguien.
description.czech: Sdělit servírce krutou pravdu nemusí být zrovna nejmoudřejší.
description.russian: Попытайтесь успокоить кого-то в неподходящий момент.
description.polish: Wybierz zły moment na uspokojenie pewnej osoby.
description.turkish: Olan biteni söyleyerek birini sakinleştireceğin yerde iyice tedirgin et.
description.brazilian: Faça um erro de julgamento na hora de tentar acalmar alguém.

description.english: Join forces with a Parisian photojournalist called Nico.
description.german: Tue dich mit einer Pariser Fotojournalistin namens Nico zusammen.
description.french: Collaborez avec une journaliste parisienne nommée Nico.
description.italian: Unisci le forze con una fotoreporter parigina di nome Nico.
description.spanish: Forma equipo con una periodista gráfica parisina llamada Nico.
description.czech: Vytvoř tým společně s pařížskou fotoreportérkou Nico.
description.russian: Объедините усилия с парижской фотожурналисткой Нико.
description.polish: Połącz siły z paryską fotoreporterką o imieniu Nico.
description.turkish: Nico adında Parisli bir foto muhabirle güçlerini birleştir.
description.brazilian: Una forças com uma jornalista parisiense chamada Nico.

description.english: Track down an assassin and uncover a medieval mystery.
description.german: Mach einen Attentäter ausfindig und decke ein mittelalterliches Geheimnis auf.
description.french: Traquez un assassin et découvrez un mystère médiéval.
description.italian: Rintraccia un assassino e rivela un mistero medievale.
description.spanish: Localiza a un asesino y descubre un misterio medieval.
description.czech: Vypátrej adresu zabijáka a poodhal prastaré tajemství.
description.russian: Отследите ассасина и раскройте средневековый заговор.
description.polish: Pójdź tropem zabójcy i odkryj średniowieczny sekret.
description.turkish: Bir suikastçının izini sür ve Orta Çağ gizemlerinden birini gün yüzüne çıkar.
description.brazilian: Siga os rastros de um assassino e descubra um mistério medieval.

description.english: Get to know all the locals on holiday.
description.german: Lerne im Urlaub alle Einheimischen kennen.
description.french: Faites connaissance avec tous les gens du coin.
description.italian: Fai la conoscenza di tutti gli abitanti del posto in vacanza.
description.spanish: Conoce a toda la población local mientras estás de vacaciones.
description.czech: Seznam se v Irsku se všemi starousedlíky.
description.russian: Познакомьтесь со всеми местными на отдыхе.
description.polish: Na urlopie zapoznaj się ze wszystkimi miejscowymi.
description.turkish: Tatilde yöre halkının tamamıyla tanış.
description.brazilian: Conheça todos os moradores locais durante as férias.

description.english: Pinball, pimples and puke.
description.german: Pinball, Pickel und Popel.
description.french: Baby-foot, cris et bagarres.
description.italian: Flipper, brufoli e vomito.
description.spanish: Pinball, mozalbetes y vomitonas.
description.czech: Všude samý automat, uher a blijavec!
description.russian: Пинбол, прыщи и отрыжки!
description.polish: Pinball, pryszcze i plwociny.
description.turkish: Tilt, sivilce ve kusmuk.
description.brazilian: Pebolim, palhaçadas e porcarias.

description.english: The Myth. The Legend.
description.german: Der Mythos. Die Legende.
description.french: Le mythe. La légende.
description.italian: Il mito. La leggenda.
description.spanish: El mito. La leyenda.
description.czech: Prostě legenda.
description.russian: Миф. Легенда.
description.polish: Sama legenda.
description.turkish: O bir mit. O bir efsane.
description.brazilian: O mito. A lenda.

description.english: Recover an ancient artefact from Lochmarne Castle.
description.german: Hole ein uraltes Artefakt aus Lochmarne Castle zurück.
description.french: Récupérez un artefact ancien au château de Lochmarne.
description.italian: Recupera un antico manufatto dal castello di Lochmarne.
description.spanish: Recupera un artefacto antiguo del castillo de Lochmarne.
description.czech: Získej prastarý artefakt nalezený na hradě v Lochmarne.
description.russian: Найдите древний артефакт в Лохмарнском замке.
description.polish: Odzyskaj starożytny artefakt z zamku w Lochmarne.
description.turkish: Lochmarne Kalesi'nden çıkarılan kadim bir eseri ele geçir.
description.brazilian: Recupere um artefato antigo do Castelo de Lochmarne.

description.english: Enjoy a private health care experience.
description.german: Mach ganz eigene Erfahrungen mit der privaten Gesundheitsversorgung.
description.french: Profitez de soins privés.
description.italian: Goditi l'esperienza della sanità privata.
description.spanish: Disfruta de la atención sanitaria privada.
description.czech: Vychutnej si práci lékaře plnými doušky.
description.russian: Узнайте, какое оно — частное здравоохранение.
description.polish: Skorzystaj z prywatnej służby zdrowia.
description.turkish: Çok özel bir sağlık hizmeti deneyiminin tadını çıkar.
description.brazilian: Aproveite uma experiência de assistência médica particular.

description.english: Saved by a surprise cat burglar.
description.german: Überraschende Rettung durch eine geschickte Einbrecherin.
description.french: Sauvé par un cambrioleur à moustaches.
description.italian: Salvato a sorpresa da un ladro felino.
description.spanish: Salvado por una ladrona felina repentina.
description.czech: Včasný zásah kočičí ženy.
description.russian: Дайте себя спасти внезапной воровке-домушнице.
description.polish: Ocalony w ostatniej chwili przez uroczą złodziejkę.
description.turkish: Sürpriz bir soyguncu hayatını kurtarsın.
description.brazilian: Salvo por uma ladra surpresa.

description.english: Gatecrash a secret meeting.
description.german: Platze in ein geheimes Treffen.
description.french: Incrustez-vous dans une réunion secrète.
description.italian: Imbucati in una riunione segreta.
description.spanish: Cuélate en una reunión secreta.
description.czech: Vběhni spiklencům do úsměvu uprostřed jejich setkání.
description.russian: Ввалитесь на тайную встречу.
description.polish: Wproś się na tajną naradę.
description.turkish: Gizli bir toplantıya davetsiz git.
description.brazilian: Entre de penetra numa reunião secreta.

description.english: Witness a gathering of powerful conspirators.
description.german: Werde Zeuge einer Zusammenkunft von mächtigen Verschwörern.
description.french: Assistez à une réunion de puissants conspirateurs.
description.italian: Assisti a un raduno di potenti congiurati.
description.spanish: Presencia una reunión de conspiradores poderosos.
description.czech: Staň se nenápadným svědkem setkání ďábelských spiklenců.
description.russian: Станьте свидетелем встречи могущественных заговорщиков.
description.polish: Bądź świadkiem spotkania potężnych spiskowców.
description.turkish: Kudretli bir gizli örgütün toplantısına tanık ol.
description.brazilian: Testemunhe uma reunião de conspiradores poderosos.

description.english: Avoid the wrath of an outraged hygiene thief.
description.german: Entgehe dem Zorn eines aufgebrachten Hygieneartikel-Diebs.
description.french: Évitez la colère d'un voleur de balayette.
description.italian: Evita l'ira di un ladro infuriato con poco senso dell'igiene.
description.spanish: Evita la ira de un ladrón higiénico enfurecido.
description.czech: Zachraň si život před pomstou zloděje toaletního náčiní.
description.russian: Избегите гнева разозлённого вора гигиенических приспособлений.
description.polish: Uniknij gniewu oburzonego złodzieja środków czystości.
description.turkish: Tepesi atmış bir hijyen düşmanının gazabından kaç.
description.brazilian: Escape da fúria de um ladrão de produto de higiene ultrajado.

description.english: Beat the assassin to a Templar artefact in Syria.
description.german: Gelange vor dem Attentäter an ein Templerartefakt in Syrien.

description.italian: Anticipa l'assassino e trova un manufatto dei templari in Siria.
description.spanish: Consigue un artefacto templario en Siria antes que el asesino.
description.czech: Uchraň v Sýrii templářský artefakt před lačným zabijákem.
description.russian: Доберитесь до артефакта в Сирии быстрее ассасина.
description.polish: Ubiegnij zabójcę w zdobyciu artefaktu templariuszy w Syrii.
description.turkish: Suriye'deki bir Tapınakçı eserine suikastçıdan önce ulaş.
description.brazilian: Consiga um artefato templário na Síria antes do assassino.

description.english: Slip past an overprotective gardener.

description.french: Échappez à la vigilance d'un jardinier un peu trop protecteur.

description.spanish: Elude a un jardinero sobreprotector.
description.czech: Proklouzni do vily přes nerudného zahradníka.
description.russian: Прошмыгните мимо садовника с гиперопекой.
description.polish: Przemknij się koło nadopiekuńczego ogrodnika.
description.turkish: Aşırı korumacı bir bahçıvanı atlat.
description.brazilian: Passe por um jardineiro superprotetor sem que ele veja.

description.english: Recover an ancient artefact from the Costa Cálida.

description.turkish: Costa Cálida'da kadim bir eseri bul.

description.english: Word of warning to the wise.
description.german: Dem Weisen genügt ein warnendes Wort.
description.french: Un avertissement pour les sages.
description.italian: A buon intenditor poche parole.
description.spanish: Una advertencia para los precavidos.
description.czech: Neber varování na lehkou váhu.
description.russian: Слова предостережения для мудрецов.
description.polish: Ku przestrodze.
description.turkish: Aklı olana ayağını denk al uyarısı.
description.brazilian: Uma advertência para os sábios.

description.english: Waste yet another opportunity to decorate.
description.german: Vergeude noch eine weitere Dekorationschance.
description.french: Perdez encore une occasion de faire de la déco.
description.italian: Spreca l'ennesima opportunità di decorare.
description.spanish: Aprovecha otra oportunidad para decorar.
description.czech: Tolik promarněných příležitostí se hned tak nevidí.
description.russian: Провороньте ещё одну возможность проявить себя в качестве декоратора.
description.polish: Zmarnuj kolejną okazję do chwycenia za pędzel.
description.turkish: Süsleme için bir fırsatı daha çarçur et.

description.english: Decode an image from an ancient Templar statue.
description.german: Entschlüssele ein Bild von einer uralten Templerstatue.
description.french: Décodez l'image d'une ancienne statue des Templiers.
description.italian: Decodifica un'immagine di un'antica statua templare.
description.spanish: Descifra una imagen de una antigua estatua templaria.
description.czech: Dešifruj výjev z nově odhalené templářské sochy.
description.russian: Расшифруйте образ с древней статуи Тамплиеров.
description.polish: Odszyfruj obraz ze starożytnej rzeźby templariuszy.
description.turkish: Kadim bir Tapınakçı heykelindeki resmi ortaya çıkar.
description.brazilian: Decifre uma imagem de uma estátua templária antiga.

displayName.spanish: A la luz de las velas

description.english: Find a hidden artefact inside an ancient candle.
description.german: Finde in einer uralten Kerze ein verborgenes Artefakt.
description.french: Trouvez un artefact caché dans une vieille bougie.
description.italian: Trova un manufatto nascosto all'interno di un'antica candela.
description.spanish: Encuentra un artefacto escondido dentro de una antigua vela.
description.czech: Nalezni důležitý artefakt skrytý v prastaré svíci.
description.russian: Найдите скрытый артефакт в древней свече.
description.polish: Znajdź artefakt ukryty w starożytnej świecy.
description.turkish: Kadim bir mumun içerisindeki gizli eseri bul.
description.brazilian: Encontre um artefato escondido dentro de uma vela antiga.

description.english: Reunite the Countess with her long lost family.
description.german: Führe die Gräfin wieder mit ihrer lange verschollenen Familie zusammen.
description.french: Réunissez la comtesse avec sa famille.
description.italian: Ricongiungi la contessa con la sua famiglia da tempo scomparsa.
description.spanish: Reúne a la condesa con sus familiares perdidos hace mucho tiempo.
description.czech: Spoj hraběnku s jejími dlouho ztracenými předky.
description.russian: Помогите Графине воссоединиться с давно утерянной семьёй.
description.polish: Pozwól hrabinie na spotkanie z dawno zaginioną rodziną.
description.turkish: Kontesi, uzun zamandır kayıp olan ailesiyle buluştur.
description.brazilian: Reúna a Condessa com sua família perdida.

description.english: Enjoy a new conversation with an old friend.
description.german: Genieße eine neue Unterhaltung mit einer alten Freundin.
description.french: Discutez de nouveau avec un vieil ami.
description.italian: Goditi una nuova conversazione con una vecchia conoscenza.
description.spanish: Disfruta de una nueva conversación con un viejo amigo.
description.czech: Využij možnosti popovídat si se starým přítelem.
description.russian: Поговорите на новые темы со старым другом.
description.polish: Porozmawiaj ze starą znajomą.
description.turkish: Eski bir dostunla iki lafın belini kır.
description.brazilian: Aproveite uma nova conversa com uma velha amiga.

description.english: Try to prank as many people as you can.
description.german: Versuche, so vielen Leuten wie möglich einen Streich zu spielen.
description.french: Essayez de faire une blague au plus de personnes possible.
description.italian: Gioca scherzi a più persone possibili.
description.spanish: Intenta gastar bromas pesadas a todos los que puedas.
description.czech: Pokus se napálit bzučákem každého, na koho narazíš.
description.russian: Попытайтесь разыграть максимально возможное количество людей.
description.polish: Spróbuj zrobić psikusa jak największej liczbie osób.
description.turkish: Elinden geldiğince çok insana şaka yapmaya çalış.
description.brazilian: Tente pregar uma peça no maior número de pessoas possível.

description.english: Climb atop a speeding train and rescue Nico.
description.german: Klettere auf einen fahrenden Zug und rette Nico.
description.french: Grimpez sur le toit d'un train en marche et sauvez Nico.
description.italian: Sali sul tetto di un treno in corsa e salva Nico.
description.spanish: Sube encima de un tren a toda velocidad y rescata a Nico.
description.czech: Vylez na střechu jedoucího vlaku a zachraň unesenou Nico.
description.russian: Заберитесь на крышу движущегося поезда и спасите Нико.
description.polish: Wejdź na dach pędzącego pociągu i uratuj Nico.
description.turkish: Hızla giden bir trenin üzerine tırmanıp Nico'yu kurtar.
description.brazilian: Suba em cima de um trem em alta velocidade e resgate Nico.

description.english: Think like a child to defeat an ancient demon.
description.german: Denke wie ein Kind, um einen uralten Dämon zu besiegen.
description.french: Retrouvez votre âme d'enfant pour vaincre un ancien démon.
description.italian: Pensa come un bambino per sconfiggere un antico demone.
description.spanish: Piensa como un niño para vencer a un demonio ancestral.
description.czech: Pokus se vyzdobit sochu hrůzostrašného démona.
description.russian: Думайте как ребёнок, чтобы победить древнего демона.
description.polish: Pomyśl jak dziecko, żeby pokonać starożytnego demona.
description.turkish: Kadim bir iblisi alt etmek için çocuk gibi düşün.
description.brazilian: Pense como uma criança para derrotar um demônio antigo.

description.english: Finish the adventure of a lifetime.
description.german: Schließe dieses unvergleichliche Abenteuer ab.
description.french: Terminez l'aventure d'une vie.
description.italian: Concludi l'avventura della tua vita.
description.spanish: Termina la aventura de tu vida.
description.czech: Dokonči své životní dobrodružství.
description.russian: Завершите грандиозное приключение.
description.polish: Zakończ przygodę życia.
description.turkish: Hayatının macerasına son noktayı koy.
description.brazilian: Termine a aventura da sua vida.

description.english: Hear some sad and shocking news.
description.german: Erhalte eine überraschende, traurige Nachricht.
description.french: Apprenez une nouvelle surprenante et triste.
description.italian: Ascolta delle notizie tristi e sorprendenti.
description.spanish: Entérate de unas noticias tristes y sorprendentes.
description.czech: Vyslechni si smutnou a překvapivou zprávu.
description.russian: Узнайте некие внезапные и грустные новости.
description.polish: Usłysz smutne i zaskakujące wieści.
description.turkish: Üzücü ve şoke edici bir haber işit.
description.brazilian: Fique a par de uma notícia triste e surpreendente.
